metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the nav_path function in lib/viewvc.py in ViewVC before 1.0.14 and 1.1.x before 1.1.26 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the nav_data name.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

viewvc - 1.1.5-1.4+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
viewvc-query - 1.1.5-1.4+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: viewvc package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.5-1.4+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
